title: How do I manage (copy/back up) contacts?
answer:
Backing up contacts to an SD card:
1. Touch Settings > DEVICE > Storage > Default Storage Location. Select the SD card.
2. On the Contacts screen, touch > Manage contacts > Export to storage and then
touch OK. You can open File Manager and check the VCF file in the root directory of

the SD card.

Recovering contacts from the SD card

3. Touch File Manager and SD card.
4. Select the backup VCF file and touch OK. Contacts on your phone are automatically
recovered from the SD card.
